name: The Abyss Shadow
description:
DISCLAMER :

- The story of  this game is imaginary, fiction and pure lies and have nothing to do with reality. 

- Don't waist your time playing this or any other video games all day long. There are more important stuff to do in life 

- For Muslims, do not play this game during the time of prayers. Pray for Allah. May Allah bless you

You are a super solider who works for the Abyss watcher organization. your job is to hunt creatures that threaten the human kind.  These creatures live in the Abyss which is some sort of dimension invisible to us,  naturally there is no interaction between us nd these creature however sometimes, things happen and thank God the watchers are always here.
